M

m - Variable in class mainmenu.Pong3
Integers that control paddle movement.
main(String[]) - Static method in class mainmenu.MainMenu
Main method to launch the project.
mainm - Variable in class mainmenu.MainMenu
Button to go back to the main menu.
mainmenu - package mainmenu
This package contains multiple class files required to create a Pong game.
MainMenu - Class in mainmenu
This class represents the pong game done in javafx.
MainMenu() - Constructor for class mainmenu.MainMenu
 
makeBarriers() - Method in class mainmenu.Pong3
This method makes the barriers for the hard mode game.
move() - Method in class mainmenu.MainMenu
This method controls the logic behind the movements of the circles in the main menu.
movePaddlesBy(int, int) - Method in class mainmenu.Pong3
This method controls the step of the paddle movement
movePaddlesTo(double, double) - Method in class mainmenu.Pong3
This method controls the boundaries of the moving paddles.
